resources.string: You can order fruits, vegetables, herbs, dried fruits, as well as those made from natural eco-friendly products (jams, salads, pickles, compotes, etc.) conveniently and with high quality and at an affordable price. Ready to cooperate mutually beneficial with shops. Our prices are the same as on the market. We are interested in saving your money and time. Delivery cost is 150 soms and more is added for the outskirts of the city. If a confirmed order is rejected for more than 2 times the Client is blacklisted!!
